inclusion.criterion: H&E staining) invasive adenocarcinoma of the breast.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary tumor ≤ 4cm and 0-3 positive axillary lymph nodes (T1-2, N0-1, M0).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must have a Medical Oncology consult with the recommendation of chemotherapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential must have a negative (urine or blood) pregnancy test within 6 weeks prior to start of protocol therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Partial breast irradiation must be scheduled to begin less than 71 days from the last breast surgical procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential must also use effective non-hormonal contraception while undergoing radiation treatment and chemotherapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Recommended regimens are as follows: Cyclophosphamide and Doxorubicin (AC); Taxotere, Doxorubicin and Cyclophosphamide (TAC); Taxotere and Cyclophosphamide (TC); or Taxotere, Carboplatin with Trastuzamab (TCH) prior to registration; or Paclitaxel and Trastuzumab.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The use of additional chemotherapy, hormonal therapy or Trastuzumab after the initial regimen is at the discretion of the Medical Oncologist.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Other primary regimens are possible but the PI must be notified prior to enrollment.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hormonal therapy for the current cancer.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with squamous or sarcomas of the breast.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has a serious medical or physciatric illness which prevents informed consent or adherence with treatment.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
